law.catch_line: The income tax required to be withheld under § 10-908 of this subtitle shall be withheld:...
law.text:
The income tax required to be withheld under § 10-908 of this subtitle shall be withheld:
by a payor other than a fiduciary or S corporation and by an employer:
on the basis of each weekly, 2-week, semimonthly, or monthly regular period of payment; or
if there is no regular period of payment as specified in item (i) of this item, on a daily basis; and
by a payor who is a fiduciary, on a quarterly basis.
